alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:29AM CST until February 04 at 11:20PM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Wabash River at Terre Haute. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. Wabash River at Covington. Wabash River at Montezuma. Wabash River at Lafayette. Wabash River at Riverton. Wabash River at Clinton. .Lowland flooding has developed along the Wabash from a combination of precipitation, snowmelt and additional rainfall. Minor flooding could be made worse by any ice jams that develop as river ice breaks up with the warmer temperatures and moves downstream. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO MONDAY, FEBRUARY 05... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Monday, February 05. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Friday /10:00 AM CST Friday/ the stage was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 18.4 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday, February 04. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 230 AM EST /130 AM CST/.
